body_html:
@nealwu: Hello! I post the problem encountered with running reader_test.py and ptb_word_lm.py at: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44855380/tensorflow-runn-error-with-reader-test-py-in-models-tutorials-rnn
You may take a look at the error message. I am not sure if there is something wrong with anaconda environment. I follow the instructions for installing tensorflow-gpu in windows by conda installation. And the installation is free of any problem.

body:
@nealwu: Hello! I post the problem encountered with running reader_test.py and ptb_word_lm.py at: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44855380/tensorflow-runn-error-with-reader-test-py-in-models-tutorials-rnn
You may take a look at the error message. I am not sure if there is something wrong with anaconda environment. I follow the instructions for installing tensorflow-gpu in windows by conda installation. And the installation is free of any problem.
